head_commit.message:
Interrupt-injection related functions (#29)

* add `inject_interrupt` method

* move `AccessWidth` and `Port` to axaddrspace

* [refactor] introduce AxMmHal

* update dependency, add some doc

* formatted

* [doc] update inject_interrupt documentation for clarity on CPU binding and interrupt handling

* fix doc error

* formatted

* [feat] introduce set_return_value API

* add `AxVCpuExitReason::SendIPI`

* update `AxVCpuExitReason::SendIPI` to match the layout and function of `ICC_SGI1R_EL1` in aarch64

---------

Co-authored-by: hky1999 <976929993@qq.com>
